version_description: Exactly like the studio version (little more complex)
The actual tuning is EADGBD, you have to tune down the 1st string one tone. I don't know if all chord names are right. Based on Sheryar Malik's youtube version.
Corrected a Chord Name from A2 to Bsus4.
First version, uses barre chords with open high e and b strings, used by Chris Martin.

song_name: No More Keeping My Feet On The Ground
No More Keeping My Feet On The Ground
